Alert Name: bush
Paulson says China must speed up reforms
Treasury secretary calls for a faster rise in the yuan's appreciation to aid economic reform and encourage open trade.
05/22/07 09:39 AM, EDT
Treasury Secretary Henry Paulson said Tuesday that China must speed up economic reforms and take steps to help the Bush administration persuade Congress that U.S. workers are benefiting from growing trade.
